Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cc-LTP2 (natural AMPs; Coffea canephora lipid transfer protein 2, plants; BWQ)

Literature Information.Literature: Warning: the sequence is not yet complete (position 8 is assumed to be an Ala).  Active against Gram- bacteria  X. euvesicatoria (inhibition zone of 0.25 mm at 75 ug/ml), and can permeate the memrbane of fungi F. solani at 200 ug/ml. Updated 6/2018.
Literature Information.Author: Bard GC, Zottich U, Souza TA, Ribeiro SF, Dias GB, Pireda S, Da Cunha M, Rodrigues R, Pereira LS, Machado OL, Carvalho AO, Gomes VM.2016
Literature Information.Title: Purification, biochemical characterization, and antimicrobial activity of a new lipid transfer protein from Coffea canephora seeds.
